title: got-enh: roadmap for got toolkit improvements
description:
Strategic improvements to expand got toolkit capabilities and ensure code quality. This epic organizes enhancement work across four main areas.

## Enhancement Areas

### 1. Testing (Priority: High)
Core quality gate ensuring RepoIter stability and correctness.

### 2. Feature Implementation (Priority: Medium)
Complete gotsel TUI tool for interactive git staging.

### 3. Documentation Cleanup (Priority: Low)
Archive or remove temporary analysis files created during RepoIter design.

### 4. Feature Expansion (Priority: Low)
Nice-to-have enhancements to RepoIter capabilities.

## Success Criteria

- RepoIter has comprehensive test suite covering all code paths
- gotsel TUI is functional and documented
- Temporary analysis files are properly archived or removed
- RepoIter supports pathspec and gitignore filtering
